DOC.detailed_description: This pilot , prospective , multi-center , randomize control trial , assess number NES patient treat either flexible dose sertraline ( Zoloft ) , cognitive behavioral therapy-informed psychotherapy ( CBT-ip ) , combine therapy ( sertraline + CBT-ip ) community care ( treatment usual TAU ) . This study provide outcomes data effect size necessary future R01 , multi-center randomize control trial . Secondary objective variable include reduction depression , anxiety , impulsivity score , improvement psychosocial functioning . After diagnosed NES video EEG monitoring ( vEEG ) , 40 participant enrol monitor two week lead period baseline NES psychosocial symptom function . At week 2 , randomize either : flexible dose sertraline ( 25 200mg ) , CBT , CBT+med , control arm , TAU . Participants randomize sertraline arm titrate 6 week 200mg dose limited side effect . The subject stay maximum fix dose next 4 week . At week 10 , subject may elect remain sertraline taper medication final two week treatment trial . Those randomized CBT-ip arm receive 12 weekly session CBT-ip NES . Those randomized CBT-ip + med arm receive treatment . Those randomized TAU arm follow treatment provider . After treatment trial , subject follow phone call month 4 , 8 , 12 enrollment ass seizure status , medication usage , global functioning . Upon enrollment , subject evaluate structured psychiatric neurological exam , bi-weekly , 30 60 minute appointment complete symptom function scale . They keep seizure diary evaluate daily seizure activity .
